messages.title: HELP FOR WORKING FAMILIES
messages.content: Conservatives have announced plans to freeze council tax for two years, saving typical families £200.

messages.title: Watford Hospital
messages.content: Richard Harrington confirms 'acute services will not be moving'.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Freeze council tax for two years saving typical families £200.
Deliver smaller schools with smaller class sizes.
Confirm that acute services will not be moving.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Polls show Richard Harrington best placed to unseat Gordon Brown's local MP.

issues.economy: Creating more jobs, freezing council tax, delivering value for money and stopping wasteful spending.
issues.education: Deliver new schools including secondary school in north Watford, smaller class sizes.
issues.health: Richard Harrington spent a night in Watford Hospital as a member of staff; acute services will not be moving from the hospital.

housing.content: Don't play political football with our children's future; Places available for local children in local schools, including a new secondary school.

leaflet.personalStatement: I hope you will trust me with your vote to be the next Conservative MP for Watford.

politicalExperience.achievements: Created successful career in business, building a company from scratch.

contactInformation.address: Watford Conservatives, 1st Floor, 44 Market Street, Watford, WD18 0PY

endorsements.endorsement: Ken Clarke talks business in Watford.

quotes.text: We have completely reorganised the schools system...

images.caption: Richard Harrington with parents and children.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Limited details on political experience and no mentions of social media accounts.
